Milan's meeting with the German deal broker Petralito was for Aubameyang. BVB's initial request is €70m but could be lowered [@DiMarzio]

Milan consider Aubameyang one of the main alternatives for Morata (primary target) and Kalinic (the most feasible name) [Di Marzio].

Aubameyang is not willing to go to China and not attracted by a PL adventure. Real Madrid and Barcelona are not interested in the player too

SG have not started any direct contacts with BVB for Aubameyang. The main obstacle is Aubameyang's father high demands.


Aubameyang's father is asking for €12m/year. With the low demand on the player, he might be forced to go below his current request.


Milan will be waiting for the right time to move towards Aubameyang [Di Marzio].

根據意媒的消息，AC米蘭目前的頭號目標是全力拿下拖連奴隊的當紅意大利本土前鋒貝洛蒂；同時AC米蘭想4000萬歐元打包碧基亞與凱塔。而球隊本週將前往德國完成R羅的交易，穆沙基奧，基斯爾也即將加盟球隊。

　　報導中提到本週米拉比利將會飛往德國，完成R羅的交易。維拉利爾的中堅穆沙基奧可能在明天加盟，黃色潛水艇的總監日前表示這是一筆對三方都有好處的交易。意大利多家媒體認為，阿特蘭大的基斯爾也已經與球隊達成協議，加盟只是時間問題。

　　另一方面，拉素的碧基亞和凱塔的合約都將在下個夏天到期，他們都沒有和球隊完成續約。今天早些時候《米蘭體育報》報導稱，AC米蘭想要以4000萬歐元的價格簽下這兩名球員，但拉素的心理價位在5500萬歐元到6000萬歐元。

　　而AC米蘭目前的頭號進攻目標是拖連奴隊的當紅炸子雞貝洛蒂，他們將全力簽下這名新晉意大利國腳，意大利轉會專家迪馬濟奧的個人網站上也報導了AC米蘭對貝洛蒂的興趣。如果交涉失敗，AC米蘭的B計劃是費倫天拿的卡利尼奇。雖然莫拉達也是球隊的轉會目標，但愛斯賓奴目前似乎更接近車路士。貝洛蒂今季正選35次，攻入27球，助攻5次，擁有搶勁的火力，而年輕也是他的優勢，1993年12月出生的貝洛蒂現在23歲，未來還有很大的成長空間。過去一段時間，貝洛蒂一直AC米蘭球迷們熱衷的轉會目標，而現在球隊也終於有所行動。

It’s reported the Chinese government could relax rules on foreign investment, allowing investors to join the Milan project.

Yonghong Li had led a consortium called Sino-Europe Sports to take over the Rossoneri, but the Beijing government imposed limitations on taking capital out of the country.

SES was therefore dissolved, with a new company, Rossoneri Sport Investment, formed to complete the takeover with the help of US hedge fund Elliott Management.

However, Libero is reporting today that the Chinese government is preparing to ease restrictions on investing abroad, allowing Li to return to his original plan.

It’s thought he will try bring several Chinese investors on board, including Lu Bo of the venture capital fund Haixa and Huarong, one of the country’s largest companies.

Milan: De Sciglio seemingly wants to leave the club:

There was a meeting today at Casa Milan between the new ownership and Mattia De Sciglio's agents as his future has been in doubt for quite some time now. Fassone, Mirabelli met with Branchini, Orgnoni (the player's agents) and De Sciglio as his contract is set to expire in 2018. He is currently making 1.5 million euros net per season. According to the latest reports in Italy, it would seem like De Sciglio asked Milan to be sold. The rossoneri club value him at around 10 million euros as Juventus have been interested in him for some time now.

Milannews.it recently reported that his future is still in the balance but it is not looking good as De Sciglio will likely want to leave the club. The parties will surely meet again soon as his future remains in doubt.... Milan beat Bologna this past week-end as they obtained the last Europa league qualification spot.

“As I’ve always said, Jose’s intention is to stay at Milan. There have been no offers, absolutely none.
